name: unsuccessfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 in a way that does not succeed or achieve the hoped for result: He ran unsuccessfully for a parliamentary seat. She tried unsuccessfully to start several small businesses. See
unsuccessful
More examplesFewer examplesShe applied unsuccessfully for more than forty jobs. He ran unsuccessfully for president in 1848.She searched unsuccessfully for a training course for her son.
